alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 26 at 2:36PM MST until August 26 at 5:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected north of Golden Valley. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 430 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry washes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 234 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms has ended north of Golden Valley. Minor flooding of normally dry wash will likely continue through 430 pm MST. - Legend Ranch Road is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Golden Valley. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
